sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing said that China-Nepal relations are ever lasting.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，中尼友好關係源遠流長。

sentences.english: With Nepal’s moving toward peace and stability, China-Nepal relations face greater opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 隨着尼走向和平與穩定，中尼關係發展面臨更大機遇。

sentences.english: He said China-Nepal friendship has been deeply rooted in the hearts of the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 他說，中尼友好深入人心。
